text: Ependes (Dictionnaire-Dikchenéro: Français-Patois/Patê-Franché. Société cantonale des patoisans fribourgeois. Fribourg: 2013. p. 166) was a municipality of the district Saane in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. Since 1977, Sales became the municipality of Ependes.Nomenklaturen – Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011. On 1 January 2021, the former municipalities of Arconciel, Ependes and Senèdes merged to form the new municipality of Bois-d'Amont. == References == == Other websites == * Ependes official website * Ependes parish website Category:Former municipalities of Fribourg
title: Ependes, Fribourg
